attributes.action: Put the UK's involvement in TTIP to a referendum.
attributes.background: The Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership is a proposed free trade agreement between the EU and the United States. This opens to the doors to the sell-off of vital public services, could bypass food regulations, hand more powers to banks and attack our privacy and employment prospects.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105856

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
